alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 10:20PM MDT until July 21 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Southwestern Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 1100 PM MDT. * At 1019 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Rush to 8 miles northeast of Punkin Center, or along a line extending from 42 miles east of Colorado Springs to 23 miles south of Limon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Karval. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
